text: 2.41: FG 2.47; 4.4; 5.14Pita mba bunin mbe nzuaim, ana buni guigira gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve thivgim, mbe ndavi domdorav Zisas zɨn panan wari ruai. Mba raan ndavi domdorgiav, Zisas zɨn vui gumgi gu mbigi mben vhɨrve khaŋ muuŋgi 3,000. Mbe zav Zisas khothivav, ana zɨn vui gumgi gu mbigi vhen vergi.
